panels.description: Requests to each cloud-profiler-dumps-collector endpoint per second with 200 and 204 status codes

targets.expr:
max(rate(cloud_profiler_dumps_collector_request_duration_seconds_sum{code=~"204|200", namespace='$namespace', cluster=~'$cluster', pod="$pod"}[$interval])
/
(rate(cloud_profiler_dumps_collector_request_duration_seconds_count{code=~"204|200", namespace='$namespace', cluster=~'$cluster', pod="$pod"}[$interval]) > 0 or on() vector(1))) by (url, method)

panels.title: Average successful response time

panels.description: Requests to each cloud-profiler-dumps-collector endpoint per second with error status codes

targets.expr:
max(rate(cloud_profiler_dumps_collector_request_duration_seconds_sum{code!~"204|200", namespace='$namespace', cluster=~'$cluster', pod="$pod"}[$interval])
/
(rate(cloud_profiler_dumps_collector_request_duration_seconds_count{code!~"204|200", namespace='$namespace', cluster=~'$cluster', pod="$pod"}[$interval]) > 0 or on() vector(1))) by (method, url)

panels.title: Error requests per second

panels.title: Failed task processing time

panels.description: Shows processed entities for task iteration

targets.expr:
max (
rate(cloud_profiler_dumps_collector_task_processed_entities{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", result="success", entity="td-top-dump"}[1m])
/
(rate(cloud_profiler_dumps_collector_task_operation_seconds_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", result="success", entity="td-top-dump"}[1m]) > 0 or on() vector(1))
) by (task)

panels.title: Task processed entities per second
